TaskDefinition.name: Business Role Mining
TaskDefinition.Description: Mine Business Roles based on organizational and functional identity attributes

Argument.name: tieredIdentityMiningAttrs
Argument.Prompt: Comma-separated list of identity mining attributes (required).

Argument.name: owner
Argument.Prompt: Default owner of mined roles (required).

Argument.name: genContainerRole
Argument.Prompt: Place mined business roles into auto-generated organizational roles using top-tier attribute.

Argument.name: containerRole
Argument.Prompt: Place mined roles into single, pre-existing Container Role.

Argument.name: bfrPrefix
Argument.Prompt: Optional prefix to apply to all mined role names.

Argument.name: minimumRoleSize
Argument.Prompt: Minimum number of users in each mined role.

Argument.name: createSubRoles
Argument.Prompt: Use sub-roles in the mining process (optional).

Argument.name: computeCoverage
Argument.Prompt: Compute population statistics (optional).

Argument.name: uidNaming
Argument.Prompt: Use generic uid naming for mined roles (default: filter-based naming).

Argument.name: simulate
Argument.Prompt: Perform What-If mining analysis (no roles are created).

Argument.name: mineITRoles
Argument.Prompt: Mine for IT entitlements on each generated Business Functional Role (optional).

Argument.name: applications
Argument.Prompt: If mining for IT Roles, the Application(s) whose entitlements will be mined.

Argument.name: threshold
Argument.Prompt: If mining for IT Roles, the percentage threshold for inclusion of an entitlement.

Argument.name: itRoleAssociation
Argument.Prompt: Associate the mined IT Role to the BFR using "required" policy (default is "permits").

Argument.name: attachITProfiles
Argument.Prompt: Attach mined IT profiles to BFR instead of creating an IT role.

Argument.name: simulation
Argument.Prompt: Simulation:

Argument.name: miningInput
Argument.Prompt: Identity Mining Attributes:

Argument.name: rolesCreated
Argument.Prompt: Roles mined:

Argument.name: rolesUpdated
Argument.Prompt: Roles updated:

Argument.name: rolesDiscarded
Argument.Prompt: Roles discarded:

Argument.name: roleCoverage
Argument.Prompt: Coverage of mined roles:

Argument.name: entMiningStats
Argument.Prompt: Entitlement mining stats:
